npcs.name: Ghost
npcs.description: A tired ghost of a a lost explorer; will this be your fate?
npcs.reply:
I once was an explorer, looking for treasures unknown,
Who got lost in this maze, my fate all my own.
Trapped in this labyrinth, now a ghostly guide
A puzzling place where time coincides
Now I guard these secrets with my soul,
And won't let you pass without a toll.
Solve the riddle and pass you shall,
But should you fail, your journey ends here, with no avail.
